children.label:
Intel

Microsoft and its partners provide integrated solutions, bringing crime intel together and helping to improve operational effectiveness and efficiency.

Information is made available to Officers through mobile devices, in relevant situations. Information can be captured digitally at the scene of a crime, improving quality and accuracy. Devices can be used to access crime tasks and historical information whilst mobile also.

Self-serve analytics ensure police forces can predict and prevent crime more effectively.

Data can be viewed in new and exciting ways, but more importantly, can reveal findings that could actually influence crucial life and death situations.

Hover over New Capabilities for more

Case Management

Microsoft provides offender management solutions that enable Police forces to more effectively manage, and collaborate on, cases.

Applications on mobile devices ensure evidence is collected in innovative ways to speed up processes and video, images and voice annotations captured during incidents complement more accurate and immediate data to provide a better view of cases.

Officers and staff can manage offenders more effectively, tracking offenders throughout the entire criminal justice lifecycle.

Actionable offender data can be accessed from anywhere and offenders can be visited more frequently with virtual monitoring solutions.

Hover over New Capabilities for more

MASH

Microsoft supports the Multi Agency Safeguard Hub initiative with a range of technologies that work together.

Policing is made more effective through innovations in incident and evidence management and more connected offender processes, providing a seamlessly connected single view of crime across territories.

Compliance and security is crucially supported to the highest OFFICIAL SENSITVE standard and so data is highly secured also.

Hover over New Capabilities for more

Comms & Control

Microsoft and its partners provide secure and tightly controlled applications on mobile devices that provide access to the right information at the right time. Officers can be more organised and respond in more relevant and effective ways.

Offender information, evidence and relevant incident information based on where an Officer is currently located, can be captured and viewed on a mobile device, enabling them to respond faster and support a quicker communication process with other agencies or relevant judicial teams.

Emergency events can be supported with data-driven response plans and a synchronised and single view of all related incident information, to better control situations.

Hover over New Capabilities for more

Crime & Custody

Microsoft and its partners provide a seamless integration between crucial Police systems and 3rd party technology.

Combine more immediate and easier access to evidence and intel to improve citizen services, speed up responses to enquiries and provide more complete and synchronised historical data of crime incidents.

Track and manage the offender life cycle more effectively, from anywhere using mobile devices, and streamline operations between agencies and judicial teams.

Benefit from advanced evidence collection and tracking solutions also, providing a more comprehensive view of crime incidents from anywhere, at any time.

Hover over New Capabilities for more

Citizen Engagement

Collaborate with citizens to improve services and resolve public safety issues faster.

Citizens benefit from a more complete view of current and historical crime information being available to agency staff and incident management is supported with applications that help to separate urgent and non-urgent incidents in an effective and organised way.

Engage citizens on social networks, helping to broaden awareness and gain vital information insights that can help close investigations faster, and reduce further incidents also.

Hover over New Capabilities for more
